content:
Posted: September 16, 2016
												The tagline should be "World okayest online multiplayer snooker game!", and that's being kind, and if the game was for iOS/Android. No graphic options so literally everything is either blurry or heavily pixelated. I was expecting something like Yahoo Pool, I used to love that game! Easy to pick up and play when you have a spare 10 minutes or so, but no. The physics aren't that great and when played online it felt like I was playing the AI.

												So, this game. Un-installed almsot straight away. Was looking through the files for the audio tracks, one or two seemed alright to listen to when say on blender or something. I found the sfx files and included was files called "sex1" and "sex2" and can confirm they are exactly what they are called. Why are these included on a snooker game? did the developer forget to take out his hidden stash upon launch? it's a snooker game.... pathetic.
